Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 44th overall pick, by Toledo in 1975...
Traded from Toledo to Pontiac on 2/6/1982 (Going to TOL: SS J. Smith, P J. Messer. Going to PON: 2B F. Williams)...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1982, off Johnathan Moon (CI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/31/1982, off Gary Chichester (WT)...
Won World Championship with Pontiac in 1983...
Released by Pontiac on 5/26/1985...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/17/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Ashburn on 7/26/1986...
